titles.title: To allow the Chief of the Army Corps of Engineers to convey certain property to the City of Nashville, Tennessee.
To allow the Chief of the Army Corps of Engineers to convey certain property to the City of Nashville, Tennessee.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

bill.summary: This bill authorizes the Department of the Army to convey, without consideration, to the City of Nashville, Tennessee, all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to the real property covered by Lease No. DACW62-1-84-149, including any improvements, at the Riverfront Park Recreational Development.
